snippet: Gov. Andrew M. Cuomo is outmaneuvering Mayor Bill de Blasio in the debate over financing for prekindergarten education in New York City and charter schools.
abstract: Michael Powell Gotham column holds that New York Gov Andrew M Cuomo is outmaneuvering Mayor Bill de Blasio in debate over financing for prekindergarten education in New York City and charter schools.
lead_paragraph: Gov. Andrew M. Cuomo is outmaneuvering Mayor Bill de Blasio in the debate over financing for prekindergarten education in New York City and charter schools.

headline.main: Cat in Albany Is Outfoxing New York City’s Mouse
headline.print_headline: Cat in Albany Is Outfoxing City’s Mouse
